Open House and Dedication of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
Date: April 17 2014

The ICAA Florida Chapter has a unique opportunity to understand the role of traditional architecture in the design of current and future temples around the world, and the impact on the built environment.

The 2013 Addison Mizner Awards
Date: October 19 2013

The Florida Chapter of the Institute of Classical Architecture and Art is pleased to announce that the 2013 Addison Mizner Medal Recipients will receive their Medals on Saturday, October 19, 2013 at a Reception to be held at The Colony Hotel in Palm Beach, Florida.

View Details

2014 Addison Mizner Sponsorship Opportunities

The Florida Chapter of the Institute of Classical Architecture and Art is pleased to announce that the 2013 Addison Mizner Medal Recipients will receive their Medals on Saturday, October 19, 2013 at a Reception to be held at The Colony Hotel in Palm Beach, Florida.

The Addison Mizner Medal will be presented in several categories for projects completed by ICA&A members located in the State of Florida and the Caribbean.

Reception for Medal Winners and Sponsors: 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM

Reception for Attendees: 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM

Medal Reception: 7:00 PM - 8:30 PM

Invitation to Sponsorship

The Florida Chapter of the Institute of Classical Architecture and Art Is pleased to announce that the 2013 Addison Mizner Medal Recipients will receive their Medals on Saturday, October 19, 2013 at a Reception to be held at The Colony Hotel in Palm Beach, Florida.

The Addison Mizner Medal awards evening will attract the finest in practitioners of architecture, interior design, landscape architecture and construction in the State of Florida and out-of-state members and award submitters.

As we build on the success of last year’s Event, we welcome your Sponsorship Participation in the following categories:

Award Categories

  • RESIDENTIAL - Small Single Family [under 5,000 Sq.Ft.]
  • RESIDENTIAL - Single Family [over 5,000 Sq.Ft.]
  • RESIDENTIAL - Multi-Family
  • INTERIOR DESIGN
  • LANDSCAPE ARCHITECTURE
  • COMMERCIAL
  • CIVIC - INSTITUTIONAL
  • HISTORIC PRESERVATION
  • RENOVATION / ADDITION
  • URBANISM
  • CRAFTSMANSHIP
  • Patronage
  • EMERGING CLASSICIST - Un-Built Student Projects

Everglades Club - Presenting Sponsors

A gift of $ 7,000 or more

We are honored to recognize your gift through the following

  • Listing for one year on the Florida Chapter website with home page direct link
  • Recognition on Florida Chapter website
  • Name and Logo presence on all event communications
  • Logo presence in the Pre-Awards slides
  • Full page acknowledgement in the Commemorative Program
  • Logo in Awards Evening Program
  • Eight tickets to the Private Reception and Awards Event
  • Special recognition and introduction from the podium by Chapter President
  • No competitive vendor type can be included in this category once registered

Casa Bendita - Sponsors

A gift of $ 5,000

We are honored to recognize your gift through the following

  • Listing for one year on the Florida Chapter website
  • Recognition on Florida Chapter website
  • Name and Logo presence on all event communications
  • Logo presence in the Pre-Awards slides
  • Half page acknowledgement in the Commemorative Program
  • Logo in Awards Evening Program
  • Six tickets to the Private Reception and Awards Event
  • Special recognition and introduction from the podium by Chapter President
  • No competitive vendor type can be included in this category once registered

El Mirasol - Sponsors

A gift of $ 3,000

We are honored to recognize your gift through the following

  • Recognition on Florida Chapter website
  • Name and Logo presence on all event communications
  • Logo presence in the Pre-Awards slides
  • One-third page acknowledgement in the Commemorative Program
  • Logo in Awards Evening Program
  • Four tickets to the Private Reception and Awards Event

Casa De Leoni - Sponsors

A gift of $ 1,500

We are honored to recognize your gift through the following

  • Logo presence in the Pre-Awards slides
  • One-third page acknowledgement in the Commemorative Program
  • Logo in Awards Evening Program
  • Two tickets to the Awards Event

La Bellucia - Sponsors

A gift of $ 1,000

We are honored to recognize your gift through the following

  • One-fourth page acknowledgement in the Commemorative Program
  • Logo in Awards Evening Program
  • One ticket to Awards Event

We are honored to recognize your gift through the following

Addison Mizner Medal Sponsorship

Sponsorship opportunities will close on 20 September 2013

Addison Mizner Medal Ceremony

Event Ticket Information can be found on the ICAA-Fl web site after August 1, 2013

Addison Mizner Medal Jury

  • Prof. Thomas Gordon Smith - University of Notre Dame
  • Dr. Symyon Mikhalovsky - Director of the St. Petersburg Academy of Fine Arts
  • Christine G. H. Franck - ICAA
